name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **AWS** to build robust backend systems that drive performance and scalability. My proficiency in API design and event-based systems ensures seamless integration across distributed architectures. I am skilled in performance tuning and developing solutions that meet complex business needs while maintaining high compliance standards.
Additionally, my background encompasses full-stack development with frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, alongside a strong foundation in **SQL** and cloud services. My strengths in communication and problem-solving equip me to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and deliver high-quality, efficient solutions for the healthcare and financial sectors.
